CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 1, 1955, pg. 2 reads: " 'YW' Official - MRs. Grady Valentine, chairman of the Committee on Administration, Centre Avenue YWCA, are among the branch chairmen in city who are actively supporting the YWCA Centennial Celebration scheduled for Jan. 18 at the Gateway Center. Members of the YWCA on that date will rededicate themselves to the "Y" policies of international, interracial inclusiveness, and world-mindedness. - Harris Photo."Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper September 3, 1955, pg. 8 reads:  The "Duchess" Gives Advice - ...Mrs. Grady Valentine, right, one of the vice chairmen of the East Area, is Centre Avenue's last presiding officer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Grady Valentine wearing blouse with ribbed v-neck, earrings, and circular rhinestone brooch, posed in interior with striped and floral wallpaper
